data.description:
In modern society, transgenderism is overwhelmingly part of presiding mental illness as seen statistically with high suicide rates in the trans community. The left has embraced transgenderism as it destroys peoples' sense of reality and attachment from their real genders, in favor of their ideal ones. Transgenderism is and always has been escapism for the mentally ill that ends up hurting them in the long-run.

It's important that we make it clear to normies that transgenderism is not normal and not healthy. Transgenderism feeds on the indoctrination of children to normalize it and potentially have kids become trans. Things like puberty blockers are given to children, which can absolutely ruin their lives by taking away their crucial period of puberty. Yet in modern society, the hyper-maturation of children in this way is being normalized. 

It's important we reject transgenderism for a mentally stable society.

That being said, this guild can be insensitive to trannies. However, if trannies do reach out to detrans, we should help back to a normal and healthy path.

data.description:
Old school rock and metal in all forms, Classic rock, hard rock, soft rock, anything that rocks. 60s-80s music preferred. Newer releases by older bands, and newer bands that play in an old school style are also allowed.

Please visit my other channels if these interest you:

+CrimeAndMystery 

+VideoEditing 

+SupremeCourtofRuqqus - Content pertaining to the law and legal cases. Has some legal content that is related to politics, but most of it is not.

+ProgRock - Progressive rock music

+NWOBHM - The music of the New Wave of British Heavy Metal

+JazzFunkFusion - Fusion, jazz, rare groove music

+IronMaiden

+Jung - Content about the work of psychologist Carl Jung

+IntellectualDarkWeb

Member of the +ApoliticalGuildsUnion, a group of guilds formed to increase the visibility of quality apolitical posts on Ruqqus. The union encourages and supports the discussion of diverse interests outside of the political sphere.

data.description:
This is a guild designed to fight against and raise awareness about the human sex trafficking trade that exists across the globe. 

Sex trafficking is defined as when a commercial sex act is mandated by force, fraud or coercion, or where the person forced to perform the act is under 18 years old. 

Sex trafficking does not only affect children, but ALL children involved in sex work are being trafficked. 

"The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing." -Edmund Burke

data.description:
This guild is for helping you to calm your mind. 

All of us get angry, sad, lost, anxious, and it really starts getting on the nerves.

Don't worry. Here, you can talk about what sets you angry to allow you to express your anxiety and also listen to calm songs.

Just lose yourself into the chilly art and soothing songs posted here. 

(Essentially, this guild is for posting soothing, serene and calm art, particularly romanticist or post-impressionist art, or calm Jazz or classical songs. Video game OSTs are also allowed. One user may also post issues about life to be able to take it out of his/her chest and ask for advice)

Rules: 

1. Comply with Ruqqus ToS.

2. No NSFW or NSFL posts. Those are instant bans. 

3. Do not spam. Spamming includes posting more than 5 posts in a single hour

4. No politics. Even if the thing giving you a headache is politics, don't discuss it here. You'll give other users headaches.

5. Posts that are unrelated to this guild topic shall be removed.

data.description:
Ruqqus is a place for all people to come abs express themselves in an intelligent manner as they see fit.

Unfortunately,  this type of free and open communication upsets many people and they form groups with which to control narratives and shame users.

Examples of this:

- The "goons" on SomethingAwful 

- /r/ShitRedditSays SJW thought control squads on reddit

- /v/protectvoat drama / harrassment architecture on voat shaming users 

This guild is for those who want to prevent this behavior from taking hold on Ruqqus,  as we've seen this destroy other websites and create echo-chambers.

If your ideas, theories, or beliefs are valid then they can stand on their own without the help of malicious brigades that shame and harrass users.

 Private guilds have a right to speak freely and congregate as they wish (within the confines of user agreement) without brigades coming and ruining the atmosphere, sending alternate accounts as they get banned.

If this sounds like something you'd be interested in,  then welcome aboard!
data.description_html:
Ruqqus is a place for all people to come abs express themselves in an intelligent manner as they see fit.

Unfortunately, this type of free and open communication upsets many people and they form groups with which to control narratives and shame users.

Examples of this:

  • The "goons" on SomethingAwful

  • /r/ShitRedditSays SJW thought control squads on reddit

  • /v/protectvoat drama / harrassment architecture on voat shaming users

This guild is for those who want to prevent this behavior from taking hold on Ruqqus, as we've seen this destroy other websites and create echo-chambers.

If your ideas, theories, or beliefs are valid then they can stand on their own without the help of malicious brigades that shame and harrass users.

Private guilds have a right to speak freely and congregate as they wish (within the confines of user agreement) without brigades coming and ruining the atmosphere, sending alternate accounts as they get banned.

If this sounds like something you'd be interested in, then welcome aboard!
data.name: StopBrigades

data.description:
This is a guild to call out shills on this platform.  Whether they be feds, paid political shills, corporate shills, etc, you can expose them here.  

What's this guild's bias?  The creator of this guild is on the right politically, and a conspiracy researcher.  We don't ban people for having different opinions, but trolls and mockers get exiled from here.   Anyone who the guild creator thinks is a useless troll or shill will get exiled.  

Factual discussion is welcomed.
